title: Microsoft

overviewContent: I manage Microsoft Entra ID to ensure secure access to corporate systems. My experience includes implementing Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), managing conditional access policies, and monitoring audit and sign-in logs for potential security issues. By maintaining strict access control policies and regularly reviewing user activities, I contribute to the organisationâ€™s overall security posture, ensuring that business-critical systems remain protected against unauthorised access.
